original: Tax time is the worst time.  Tax law is ridiculously complicated and, if you get it wrong, you could miss out on a windfall or end up with a huge bill to help Uncle Sam buy shitty rest stop trash cans and bombs.   Filing a tax return is a long, tedious, stressful process.  That's all about to change!  We promise to maximize your bottom line... TOPLESS!  Our team of qualified female accountants is on call 24/7 to get you through tax season or help you organize your finances with a smile on your face!  Time flies when you're having fun.  Email us now for a brochure and/or initial consultation.  We put the tits in tax!  And we're tax deductible.
translated: 报税的日子最头疼。税法复杂到过于可笑，一不小心就有可能损失大笔财富，或是给山姆大叔的炸弹和服务区垃圾桶买单。纳税申报单又臭又长，填得时候还压力山大。但是马上就要不一样了！我们保证会让你的到手收入最大化... TOLESS！我们的团队由技术过关的女会计师组成，24小时全天候服务，助你度过报税期，或是帮你打理资产，给你带来笑容。欢乐的时光总是过得很快。邮件联系我们，即可获取相关资料、进行初步咨询，我们给税务加上了奶子佐料！我们的服务是可以抵税的。
